name: pairl
description: Generate, validate, and convert agent-to-agent messages using the PAIRL v1.1 protocol. Achieves 70-90% token reduction with built-in budget tracking and cost reporting.
author: dwehrmann

examples.title: Generate PAIRL message
examples.command: /pairl generate: Can you analyze the sales data and send me a report by Friday?

defaultValidationMode.description: Default validation mode for PAIRL messages

autoGenerateRIDs.description: Automatically generate record IDs (@rid) for all records

includeHash.description: Include @hash field for message integrity verification

defaultBudget.description: Default budget to apply to generated messages (e.g., '0.10USD')
